name: Fjallraven Abisko Trekking Short Sleeve Shirt - Men's
description:
For hot-weather hiking, the Abisko Trekking Shirt is a welcome layer for venting and sun protection. The technical fabric wicks sweat, promotes air circulation and feels cool against your skin. The collar can be turned up and secured for extra protection against the sun and the chest pockets also function as ventilation openings.Quick-drying stretch fabric is recycled polyester blend.Chest pocket doubles as a ventilation opening.Collar can be buttoned around the neck for sun protection.Stuffs into a chest pocket for packing.

        Sustainability
